title: Naughty & Nice
body:
She is sleeping with both of them so she can be both halves of who she really is – Naughty & Nice

Epilogue

Waking up in bed with Harry next to her made Savannah the happiest girl in the world. They had been seeing each other for eight blissful months and it was only getting better and better. The thing…

summary: Wow, just had the greatest realisation, as often I wonder why Harry can be so free and gay on stage and whatever with no one...
body:
Wow, just had the greatest realisation, as often I wonder why Harry can be so free and gay on stage and whatever with no one questioning it and wondered why Louis was still stuck under the stupid stories made by Modest.

The reason being Louis has taken up the image of being ‘totally hetero’ having to have a fake girlfriend, a 'kid’ and all the other shit, due to keeping their relationship private from the media they would have to act so that they don’t think that Lou and Harry are together, but Lou takes all the responsibilities from Harry by acting in Modest’s little stories so that Harry can be free and dosn’t have to also act in Modest’s games.

Its kind of sad really 😢

blog.name: thelemonandthelime
blog.title: I'm Gin.
blog.description: •●○☆ Quasi-Astrologer • Nature Lover • Harry Styles Enthusiast ☆○●•

summary: How does harry liliths affect him? I need to know
question: How does harry liliths affect him? I need to know
answer:
Okay, so.. there are several Liliths to choose from in astrology. Assuming you mean the one that most people see on astro.com under the additional objects, that would be the Mean Black Moon Lilith (can also be found as h21, though will be in a slightly different position because while it’s the same thing, it’s calculated from a different vantage point.). There is also an asteroid Lilith (asteroid 1181), as well as a Dark Moon Lilith (reference point is numbered as h58 on astro.com, and is a hypothetical “second moon” for earth, that some people think they’ve seen, but it hasn’t been confirmed, so I don’t use it) and a True Black Moon Lilith (reference number is h13, different from Mean Black Moon Lilith because True is the exact celestial point in the galaxy of the moon’s orbit only happening twice per month, farthest away from earth, thus the word “true”. Mean is a celestial point based on averages.) I prefer Mean Lilith because it seems to be the most accurate, in my opinion.

If you are still with me, good job!

In Biblical lore Lilith was Adam’s first wife, formed from the same clay as Adam after God created Adam and then Adam decided he needed a companion. After time, Adam and Lilith began to disagree on the fact that Adam should be the dominant figure, when Lilith believed they should be seen as total equals. She ran to the edge of the Red Sea and became a demon, mated with and had the children of demons. Adam decided he wanted Lilith back, so God sent angels to collect her. She didn’t want to leave, so the angels killed her children. She decided to take revenge out on humanity, and began sleeping with men, and killing human children. God then created Eve, who took on the role of Adam’s wife, and Lilith was mostly forgotten. She represents and has been used as a warning of strong willed women throughout history and the repercussions of basically not knowing “their place”. In astrology, she represents the wild, dark, wounded side of nature (though not the same as Chiron, the wounded healer). 

We’re going to use the glyph version that is most heavily used on astro.com, under objects simply called Lilith, and again, this is the Mean Black Moon Lilith (MBML) for this interpretation.

Harry’s MBML is at 22 degrees of the sign of Aries, in his 6th house. This would make Harry someone who likes a challenge and is a bit of a perfectionist. He wouldn’t like to be seen as weak or vulnerable very often. It makes him fiercely independent and someone who stands up for just causes. He’s not afraid to use his sexuality in his career to get ahead, and he’s also a really, really hard worker. In fact, much of the time he probably uses work as an outlet for his keyed up sexual energy. Down time is probably pretty hard for him, as he needs to be moving and doing things and feeling productive. This placement makes him very restless.  He probably has a bit of a healing touch, physically. 

Harry was probably the quietest in terms of the treatment from his previous management with One Direction, but he was also probably the most used member of the band. Someone with this placement can be easily taken advantage of by higher-ups, so much so that there is a need to break free and become your own boss. I’ve heard that it was Harry’s idea for the band to take a break, and it’s understandable with this placement. 6th house placements produce a need to please and it probably caused him constant anxiety that he was being used as much as he likely was, thus prompting him to break free. Good for him, I say. The band may have given him everything, and it’s obvious he’s grateful, but it was also terrible for his health. Sharing and partnerships can be a struggle for people with this placement, at least on a daily basis. They need space from anything resembling control over them from time to time, to recharge. 

Harry has probably realized at this point that he will always be in the service of other people. Someone who has this placement in Aries may have a hard time accepting this, and at times can feel caged by the realization, however the fact that this placement resides in an earth house can help and hinder that fact, both at the same time. The help comes from the fact that the earth environment of this placement can lessen the heat of Aries, so that the selfishness of the placement doesn’t grow out of control. The hinder comes from the fact that such a selfish placement is forced to serve others, being that it’s in the 6th house. It will be a constant struggle, but should be made easier by the fact that he is, at this time at least, seemingly in control of his own affairs and that he has a career that he genuinely seems to love. 

This is a placement of a lover that is very sensual, very passionate. Someone who all at once wants to take in sexual situations, while also wanting to give. This placement is in opposition to his rising, so I can see it causing a bit of awkwardness to his already slightly awkward personality. There would definitely be a lot of push and pull in his personality that can make people uncertain of where he’s going to come from next. Especially since he’s got so much Aquarius in his chart.

body:
Yo larries

I just spent a solid 30 minutes staring at harry styles hd photos and he did’t have the L tattoo while on tour so it had to have been done before the Gucci photoshoot so it’s fairly recent. That plus the fact that All Along will be released on September 28 IS TOO MUCH FOR ME TO HANDLE OKKKK

I need A HUG
